post.author: 부기흡

comment.author: 오승준
comment.content: Congratulations! Also, it's pretty interesting article.

comment.author: 임정숙
comment.content: 축하합니다. 저한테는 너무 기술적이인 부분인 많아 어려웠지만, 그래도 재밌게 읽었습니다.

post.content:
My paper has been published in the January (2004) issue of Websphere Developer Technical Journal. Not a bad start for Chinese New Year :-) It is about data round-tripping between SQL and XML domains.

Enjoy!

http://www-106.ibm.com/developerworks/websphere/techjournal/0401_boo/boo.html
post.title: New technical article on XML and SQL
